biotools.summary: precision-medicine-toolbox is an open-source python package for medical imaging data preparation for data science tasks. This package is aimed to provide a tool to curate the imaging data and to perform exploratory feature analysis.

bioschemas.name: UM - Precision Medicine Toolbox
bioschemas.summary: precision-medicine-toolbox is an open-source python package for medical imaging data preparation for data science tasks. This package is aimed to provide a tool to curate the imaging data and to perform exploratory feature analysis.
